title: (4245) 2 Storied Luxury House for Sale Baddagana, Pitakottea
details: 2 Storied Luxury House for Sale Baddagana, Pitakottea Close all Super Markets & Banks, Large Garden on 25 Perches. Parking for more than 6 Vehicles, 6 Bedrooms With A/C, Bathrooms, Modern Pantry and Curry Kitchen. Domestic & Drivers Quarters, Modern Toilets 30x12 Swimming Pool & Baby Pool, Rs : 1650/= (Negotiable) 165 Million
